body:
Hi,


Another possibility is to look at using FBX to get data out of Autocad. 
FBX can then be converted to OBJ using Autodesk's free FBX convert 
application, which can be found here:


    http://usa.autodesk.com/fbx/


However, the challenge may be in how the resulting obj is organized (eg 
grouping of geometry by layer/material...)


-Jack
